def_en: A captive person or animal is being kept imprisoned or enclosed.

def_cn: （观众）被强制的，受控制的;(市场)垄断的，没有选择权的
def_en: A captive audience is a group of people who are not free to leave a certain place and so have to watch or listen. A captive market is a group of people who cannot choose whether or where to buy things.
If you take someone captive or hold someone captive, you take or keep them as a prisoner.
